      • buildRequestAddressLine

        public static java.lang.String buildRequestAddressLine(CisAddress address)
        This is a workaround for a known error in Avalara where is occasionally switches address lines. Concatenate all address lines to line one
        Parameters:
        address -
        Returns:
        the appended address line

      • buildResponseAddressLine

        public static java.lang.String buildResponseAddressLine(Address address)
        Avalara may put the PO box information(maybe also something else) in the response address line 2, even if it was in the line 1 in the request address. Use this method to avoid miss comparing.
        Parameters:
        address -
        Returns:
        the appended address line
